entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink: argument out of range when formatting MSBuild message for a warning #93804
  • ILLink: stack overflow when handling type parameters in compiler generated code #93803
  • ILLink: ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ILProcessor #93802
  • ILLink: FormatException when building a diagnostic message #93800
  • ILLink: TrimmerRootAssembly: error IL1032: Root assembly '…' could not be found #93799
  • ILLink: argument exception in Cecil when writing assembly #93797
  • ILLink : InvalidCastException in AssemblyReferencesCorrector #93796
  • [Feature request]: Support SchemaUrl and instrumentation scope attributes for OpenTelemetry tracing and metrics #93795
  • [wasm] WBT does not use locally built ILLink.Tasks #93789
    9.0.0
  • Unable to build Android app on Windows with profiled AOT and EnableLLVM=true #93788
  • RequiresDynamicCodeAnalyzer misses MakeGenericType calls #93785
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT iOS/osx/tvos legs are timing out on many PRs #93784
  • Inconsistency when Parsing System.Reflection.AssemblyMetadataAttribute Value #93781
  • System.Text.Json 7.0.2 fails to load in a .net6 application. #93780
  • [mono] Deadlock on TypeInitializationLock in mono_runtime_class_init_full #93778
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Typo in browser-bench wasm app #93777
  • aspnetcore tests having Dynamic.Proxy fails on ppc64le architecture #93770
  • Test failure profiler\\assembly\\ALCTest\\ALCTest.cmd #93768
  • MetricEventSource value published events don't unambiguously resolve which Meter and Instrument tags they are refering to #93767
    9.0.0
  • EnumConverter ignores naming policy for property names on deserialization #93765
    9.0.0
  • TarReader throws on archive that other tools accept #93763

Closed

  • Interlocked.Read from 32-bit apps are much slower on Intel Sapphire Rapids CPUs #93624
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Tests have 6 tests failing on my machine - daylight time #93736
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] runtime tests timing out on `Build Tests` step for rolling builds #93134
  • [wasm] `Inline array struct must have a single field. assembly:System.Private.Xml.dll type:<>y__InlineArray2`1 member:(null)` - perf run broken #93348
  • SuperPMI replay failure: (unsigned)reg < ArrLen(regMasks) #93527
    9.0.0
  • Interop.cgroups.FindCGroupsVersion broken for cgroups v1 #93581
  • AesGcm documentation needs some adjustments #88933
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http30.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #93738
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Unpredicated instructions #93614
  • Known issue: NuGet "FatalProtocolException : Unable to load the service index" #90951
  • [mono][tests] IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLib reports hostname is not provided on linux bionic #93103
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: `NonWasmConsoleBuild_WithWorkload` - test fails 9.0 sdk does not have a 9.0 runtime pack #93585
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Stable branding for .NET 8 GA #93807
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Pass/receive SIMD arguments by value. #93794
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Honor naming policy of JsonStringEnumConverter on dictionary key deserialization. #93792
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix configuration test #93786
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Add common parent for frozen objects #93773
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add explicit block fallthrough successor #93772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • hosting windows service helper enhancement #93771
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution

Merged

  • Improve performance of UnmanagedMemoryStream #93766
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add runtime base address to Native AOT crash info JSON #93791
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Clarified that contributors use forks instead of branches of dotnet/runtime #93793
    area-Meta
  • Add runtime base address to Native AOT crash info JSON #93790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Add package readme to System.Numerics.Tensors #93806
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #93707
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #93706
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/8.0] Vectorize TensorPrimitives APIs #93746
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization Get available locales #93751
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add package readme to System.Numerics.Tensors #93798
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix timezones test failures when having en-GB UI culture #93753
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file #93744
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] [Test Only] Fix options source gen test #93782
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix analysis of interface methods on generic types #93748
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support specifying multiple directories through SSL_CERT_DIR. #93749
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • perf CI: fix non-wasm runs #93779
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [7.0] Disable STJ build for 7.0.14 #93762
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Disable STJ build for 6.0.25 #93761
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: create recursive tail call scratch block early in morph #93764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reference live ILLink analyzer #93259
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix minor documentation error for `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>.Round(TSelf, int, MidpointRounding)` #88458
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update MsQuic to 2.2.3 #93542
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Use live reference pack for IntrinsicsInSystemPrivatecorelibAnalyzer.Tests #93721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add package readmes (continued) #93769
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable failing runtime tests #93712
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add native AOT cross build docs #93638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove cgroup PAL test #93757
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline runs #93688
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] JIT: remove incorrect type deduction for an Unsafe.As case #93703
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Test upgrading to ICU 72.3 #93756
    needs-area-label
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93760
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Trim analyzer: Implement intrinsics handling of object.GetType #93732
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [System.HashCode] Adjust nullable annotation on generic Add method which accepts IEqualityComparer #91905
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for number conversion when possible #89330
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Test NFloat.IsNegative against its native type equivalent #93734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Optimize JsonContent fast path #93759
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] NaN-box float arguments #93665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Vector128.ShuffleUnsafe #88559
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #93662
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Report Requires diagnostics from dataflow analyzer #92724
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Add a test for determinism #93600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Update NotNullIfNotNull documentation #93750
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Should we drop WasmImport and use DllImport #2414

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Self-contained publish without restore doesn't work with --arch/-a argument but does work with -r/--runtime #36334
  • Publishing container images leaves 'orphaned' images from previous builds #36304
  • Can we finally remove "// See https://aka.ms/new-console-template for more information" from the console template? #36293

Closed

  • dotnet tool install attempts to install an unlisted package on nuget.org #32092
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • 8.0.100-rc.1 dotnet tool update fails #36015
  • Regression: `dotnet tool restore` with a `dotnet-tools.json` is broken in .NET 8 RC 2 #35989
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • .NET8 RC1 dotnet tool install <package> does not work when nuget.org is blocked #35517
  • SDK needs newer version of format #36219

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert skipped tests due to VS 17.8-p3 #36337
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When logging message-level messages strip code so that external tools don't flag the message as a warning #36329
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36297
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Validate attribute type defines when excluded #36282
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat, 8.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] GenAPI - Emit attribute type defines when excluded #36284
    Servicing-consider, Area-GenAPI, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36280
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add --no-http-cache option and hide --no-cache option for dotnet restore command #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36149
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Records" (VS 16.8, .NET 5) #39
    9.0
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Provide a way to annotate methods that will always throw. #739
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

PullRequests

Updated

  • replace speclet terms with ECMA standard terms #7606
  • Expanding ref support #7555

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseType #70488
  • Roslyn crashes when accessing exception variable #70483
    17.9
  • Improve the user experience for Add reference quick action with respect to Incompatible references #70479
    Backlog

Closed

  • Crash when applying code fix to aspx file that is open in Visual Studio #67410
    17.9
  • Setting .editorconfig trim_trailing_whitespace option to false is ignored #41666
    Backlog
  • `Nullable<T> ?? constant-expr` generates unnecessary temporary #56007
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34220.23 #70486
  • Make restore.cmd and build.cmd runnable from Git Bash #31466

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report all errors and rude edits to the log #70503
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Prevent a bit of dictionary resizing in NullableWalker.Variables.Populate #70502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Test update editor version to 17.8.216 #70500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip elements with false conditions during evaluation #70496
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'use collection expression' with await-foreach calls #70494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce dependency on ImmutableDictionary in CompletionItem's properties storage. #70474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add IVT to a future unified razor test project #70485
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Shorten the namedpipe used to connect with C# extension #70492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Mark diagnostics as being 'live' or not in LSP #70402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer extract method mutation computation till the point the code action is invoked. #70477
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Front load extract-method syntax and semantic checks. #70466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Tiny cleanup in SyntaxGenerator. #70480
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issue where primary constructors were not being grouped across TFMs in the results window #70476
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70478
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70473
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bugs/22745 Naming style does not match for camel case and pascal case with underscores #56157
    Area-IDE
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Utilize ConstantValueOne while emitting conditionals #70352
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test CI with version only change #70471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: single_query #51531
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plaintext, plaintext #51530
  • Deprecate support for manual chunking #51529
  • Cannot deserialize into `google.protobuf.NullValue` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51521
  • Support `google.type.Decimal` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51520
  • In Blazor WebApp with auto render mode, how to resolve the pages or routeData from wasm? #51518
  • DotNetDispatcher.cs(391,67): error IL2111: Method 'ScanTypeForCallableMethods(Type)' with parameters or return value with `DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute` is accessed via reflection #51517
  • JsonPath for private properties #51514
  • blazor wasm project deployed with error when config `PublishTrimmed true` and `TrimMode link` #51513
  • In Dmain Driven Design (DDD) , Should be use the IRepository contract in the application layer or in the domain layer? #51511
  • Enable using the Blazor WebAssembly loading progress indicator in a Blazor Web App #51510
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor wasm hosted in a subfolder doesn't hot reload on changing #44568
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #51485
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextSansFilter #51515
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when using RenderModeAuto in .NET 8 RC1 #51236
    8.0.0
  • Using SupplyParameterFromQuery on arrays, Blazor Wasm triggers too many on OnParametersSet #51351
  • Add async support to form validation with EditContext on submit #51501
  • RC2 Blazor Web App template nits and inconsistencies #51495
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51469
  • Perf regression: single_query #51487
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #51504
  • Perf regression: fortunes #51505
  • Blazor AuthorizeView in latest .Net8.rc-2 Blazor-Web-App template not working reliably #51368
    8.0.0
  • Crash issue with SignalR-Client-CPP ， Help me #48139
  • Signalr: Request for Optimized Client-Server Communication #48239

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Add table to README with links to nightly builds #51534
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #51532
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for .NET 8 #51527
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency from dotnet-sql-cache #51524
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove duplicate .sln from Blazor Web Template WebAssembly and Auto #51494
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Add retries to the node install script #51525
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51456
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2dd1c13` to `116b7e5` #51523
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51498
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix Blazor template bug where a logged in user could appear to be unauthenticated #51497
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Improve MultipartReader performance #51426
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Blazor web template cleanup #51337
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error using `dotnet-gcdump` on Android device #4348

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle sessionId as ulong instead of long in EventPipeSession.cs. #4345

Updated

  • Add Meter Tags, Instrument Tags, and Scopes to System Diagnostics Metrics #4324

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView does not recompute scroll size when content is being modified programmatically. #18207
  • Shadow performance in .NET 8 has dropped precipitously in Windows, rendering previously in .NET 7 easily at 30+ FPS (frames per second), now as low as 1 FPS #18205
  • Drawing of Borders lags behind other elements on iOS creating bizarre overlaps and glitches (okay in Windows/Android) #18204
  • Shadows are incredibly slow to draw in Android, dropping app performance to 6 FPS (frames per second) #18202
  • Element not found. Exception. #18201
  • Flyout Page SetCollapseStyle doesn't have any change #18200
  • FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync very slow #18199
  • CommunityToolkit.Maui.Views.Popup Button Text Alignment #18195
  • [iOS] Navigation doesn't work on sixth tab in shell #18193
  • CarouselView performance is bad #18190
  • [iOS] some tabs are hidden with focused shell search on physical iPhone #18188
  • Sometimes Crash when using Maui Essentials Send Email #18181
  • [regression/8.0.0] New Projects with spaces in the names are putting those spaces into ApplicationId (instead of underscores as previously) causing failure to build #18177
    .NET 8 GA
  • Search bar log file like in Chrome #18175
  • Pair to Mac Too Slow #18174
  • Shadows not drawing/updating correctly in Windows & cover entire screen (okay in Android/iOS) #18172
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Borderless Entry Handler Not Working in .NET MAUI 8.0 #17448
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Window "blinks" when resized #17724
    .NET 8 GA
  • .Net8 Regression - Custom entry handlers not working #18189
  • Using a Brush in the App resources causes memory leak #15231
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • AppTheme behaving incorrectly in flyout menu #17922
  • Enable <Nullable> in .NET MAUI project templates #17987
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] SkiaSharp signature check fails for deployment (Visual Studio local iOS device) #17930
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI is not correctly drawing or updating shadows causing bizarre outcomes in numerous situations in Windows (simple repro project included) #17996
  • Nested Border renders top left corner bizarrely wrong with truncation in iOS/Windows (okay in Android) #17761

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [WinUI] Fixes window blinking when resizing #18216
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Update aspnet versions #18215
  • [net8.0] Move tests to use iOS17 and Android 33 #18214
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Disable the new iOS code for now #18206
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add NuGet package information #18197
    .NET 8 GA
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎

Merged

  • Update dev getting started instructions #18196
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ci] Update dependabot.yml #18192
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Add permission for high-speed sensors #18180
    .NET 8 GA
  • Disable the new iOS code for now #18198
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Update versions #18167
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Add permission for high-speed sensors #18182
    area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2045.28 to 1.0.2088.41 #18084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix 17776 #17796
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18105
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Set Nullable=enable in Control Samples projects #18114
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] Fix iOS tests net7 #18163
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18122
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tools: Remove --msbuildprojectextensionspath #32113
  • move GetValueGenerated logic for json ordinal keys from sqlserver to relational #32111
  • RC2 IEntityType changes break libraries like MassTransit #32105
  • No extra newline between query tags #32104

Closed

  • Adding a column comment with .HasComment does not generate working script when targeting Oracle #32107
  • Throw better message for subquery for entity with composite primary key #23671
  • To be quite honest Im happy to get your own platform up and running on my own.I did mean for it to work the ways as you had planned and meant to extend the use of it in the future.It seems like ... #32109
  • Migration Generation Fails With Method Not Found Exception #32100
  • Incorrect SQL for Any() with predicate that contains comparison with null #32103
  • Problem with proper configuration database with EF core 7 using UTC dates #32097
  • Consider source-generating all the event/logging stuff #28603
    MQ
  • Add source index build step #25096
    MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #32110
  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17594
